casebody.data:
In the Matter of M.R.S., and L.N.S. No. 528P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Richard E. Jester, for Mother. Holly Groce, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of November 2007 by Petitioner (DSS) to Dismiss Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

*840"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
